title: Ticket #148: Resolved tickets do not appear w/ strike thru in wiki
description:
In the wiki, tickets that have been closed should appear formatted with strike-thru. This is a very handy feature.

The reason it is not working is simple: we added our own custom "closed" values (resolved, aborted), and these custom closed values need to have a tag setup in the style sheet.
remarks:
2009-Jan-29 11:28:33 by tannenba:
Fixed by simply editing cvstrac.css (attached to setup page) appropriately.
